name: 蒂莫西·保罗·麦卡锡
name_full: 蒂莫西·保罗·麦卡锡 Timothy Paul McCarthy
introduction: Timothy Paul McCarthy is an actor best know for his disturbing on screen presence, humorous, timely re-actions and contemplative, melancholy despondency. Timothy Paul McCarthy is a Toronto based actor appearing in feature films ABCs of Death 2, Latenight Double Feature, Slightly Used, and The Amorphous Mind Police Factor. Short films include GINA, The Deacon, No Solicitors, Little Dougie, The Resurrections of Clarence Neveldine, Spookslayers, and Nash Caruthers: Deathbox. Timothy lives a life in constant exchange with the creative process as an actor, musician and artist. Dedicated, professional and courteous, Timothy's film work is focused on revealing true human emotion.
